sentence.Network_en: This delusory vision kept him out of action at Midway.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种狂妄的幻想使他在中途岛战役中一无作为.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from late Latin delusorius, from delus- 'mocked', from the verb deludere (see delude)

means.word_mean: 1. causing one to believe what is not true or fail to believe what is true;

auth_sentence.content: Of course, neither perception is anything but delusory.
